titleStmt.title: By Lieutenant-General Ginckell, commander in chief of their Majesties forces. Whereas directions have been given that the arears of the army, and more particularly of those regiments of it, that are forthwith to embarque from this kingdom, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Reede-Ginckel, Godard, Baron van, 1644-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen at their Majesties printing-house on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the castle of Dublin, this 25th day of November. 1691.".
Steele notation: Arms 201. Ar- out Warrants.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
